task.title: Shutting down the appliance by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can shut down the appliance by using the System Control page in the .

context.p: You can shut down the appliance by using the , or by using the command line. For more information about using the command line to shut down the appliance, see .

step.cmd: Go to the System Control page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: On the Home tab, click System Control in the Customize appliance settings pane.
On the Appliance menu, click System Control.

step.cmd: In the Appliance pane, click Shut down the appliance.
step.info: A window opens, asking if you are sure you want to shut down the appliance.

step.stepresult: You are logged out of the .
